description:
The Momentum is an affordable, all-around climbing harness. It uses Dual Core Construction with 2 slim bands of high-tensile webbing on the outer edges of the waistbelt and a venting foam insert in the centre to balance comfort and breathability without pressure points.

  • Bullhorn-shaped waist with lightweight, breathable padding fits the contours of your hips
  • Padded lumbar insert adds some comfort during extended hanging belays
  • Prethreaded SpeedAdjust buckle cinches quickly and securely
  • Adjustable legs with trakFIT adjustment for easy customization
  • 4 moulded gear loops and a rear belt loop for clipping a chalk bag
  • Women's specific rise
name: Black Diamond Momentum Harness - Women's
